channel.title: CFG Load fail?

item.title: CFG Load fail?
item.dc:creator: @Yorchi_elite Yorchi elite
item.description:
@Yorchi_elite wrote:

im move the folder, and added this:

	loadNPCList("./Config/npc.cfg");
	loadNPCDrops("./Config/npcdrops.cfg");
	loadAutoSpawn("./Config/autospawn.cfg");

My java Files is in folder called : Java
My Config Files is in folder Called : Config

so my config file is in Server/Config/

Server is the folder where all is in

Read full topic
